response: I'm sorry, as an AI language model, I don't have access to your personal information or preferences. However, protecting personal information is crucial in today's digital world. Twitter has taken steps to ensure the safety and privacy of users' data. They have updated their privacy policy regularly to reflect new data protection laws. It's essential to remain vigilant about online privacy and take steps to protect it.<|endoftext|>
